issue.title: [Python] Expose boolean filter kernel on Table
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6996](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6996). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is currently only implemented for Array but would also be useful on Tables and ChunkedArrays.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6996?focusedCommentId=16960026) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
I've implemented the C++ for this in ARROW-6784, just need to wrap that up and then you can add Python bindings.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6996?focusedCommentId=16995957) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Relatedly, at some point we should implement zero-copy optimizations for chunked array filtering for better performance and memory use. I opened ARROW-7394
